briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for a Generic Property server models instance.

parameterdescription.para: Array of properties supported by the server.
Number of properties supported by the server. Cannot be larger than embed:rst:inline :kconfig:`CONFIG_BT_MESH_PROP_MAXCOUNT` .
Getter handler for property values.
Setter handler for property values.

briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for a Generic Property server models acting as a Generic User Property Server.
Initialization parameters for a Generic Property server models acting as a Generic Admin Property Server.

parameterdescription.para: Array of properties exposed by the server.
Getter function for property values.
Setter function for property values.

briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for a Generic Property server models acting as a Generic Manufacturer Property Server.

parameterdescription.para: Array of properties exposed by the server.
Getter function for property values.

briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for a Generic Property server models acting as a Generic Client Property Server.

parameterdescription.para: Array of properties exposed by the server. May be constant.

briefdescription.para: Generic User Property Server model composition data entry.
Generic Admin Property Server model composition data entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Generic Property server models instance acting as an Admin Property Server.

briefdescription.para: Generic Manufacturer Property Server model data entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Generic Property server models instance acting as a Manufacturer Property Server.

briefdescription.para: Generic Client Property Server model data entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Generic Property server models instance acting as a Client Property Server.

detaileddescription.para: Enumeration of all property server states.

briefdescription.para: Publish a list of all properties on the server.

parameterdescription.para: Server that owns the property.
Message context to publish with, or NULL to publish on the configured publish parameters.
Successfully publish a Generic Level Status message.
The given property size is not supported.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_prop_srv *srv, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_prop_val *val)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_prop_srv_pub

parameterdescription.para: Server that owns the property.
Message context to publish with, or NULL to publish on the configured publish parameters.
Value of the property.
Successfully publish a Generic Level Status message.
The server is a Client Property server, which does not support publishing of property values.
The given property size is not supported.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
